question:
[Freddie] loved going to the store with his mom [Judy]. She always bought him snacks [Beverly] watched a golf tournament with her aunt [Ethel]. [Gerald] and [Lawrence] were both still very upset with their mother, [Judy]. [William] bought a new dress for his daughter [Beverly]. [Manuel] wanted to buy his sister a birthday gift but her son [William] said she did n't want any gifts. [Alice] planned a trip to the zoo for her brother, [Gerald]. They had a great time. [Alice] and her uncle [Kenneth] went to the pet shop. [Alice] saw a puppy that she loved, so [Kenneth] bought it for her. [Manuel] took his son [Kenneth] out for pizza.
Question: How is [Ethel] related to [Freddie]?
